context: I made an inappropriate comment in a meeting
letters:
I hope this message finds you well. I want to take a moment to sincerely apologize for my comments during our recent meeting. Upon reflection, I realize that what I said was inappropriate and could have made you feel uncomfortable. That was never my intention, and for that, I am truly sorry.

I value the respectful and collaborative atmosphere we strive to maintain as a team, and I regret that my words did not reflect that commitment. I recognize that every voice matters, including yours, and I am dedicated to ensuring that our discussions remain inclusive and supportive.

Please know that I have taken this situation to heart. I am committed to learning from this experience and making sure that it does not happen again. Thank you for your understanding and for your continued professionalism. I appreciate the opportunity to work alongside you and look forward to rebuilding your trust.

Warm regards,  
[Your Name]
